messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content:
Dear Voter,

Does your local MP represent your views – on the EU, on immigration, on local building plans and on local transport? The voters of West Oxfordshire have a rare opportunity to create a shock-wave on May 7th, by supporting UKIP. If you want a fair EU referendum, rather than the broken promises of our PM; if you want us to sort out the A40 logjams once and for all; and if you want to stop the plan to build 10,500 houses across this rural constituency; SHOW that you want a radical change for the better by voting UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

Dear Voter,

Does your local MP represent your views – on the EU, on immigration, on local building plans and on local transport?
issues.health:
Invest in the NHS

UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
issues.immigration:
Control our borders

UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
issues.socialWelfare:
Fairer tax system

UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.

housing.content: if you want to stop the plan to build 10,500 houses across this rural constituency

images.caption: Simon Strutt in Witney Standing Up for Real Change

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Erika Barnby on behalf of Simon Strutt, both of 5 East St Helen Street, Abingdon OX14 5EG. Printed by Media Print Group, Park Lane House, Park Lane, Oldbury B69 4JX.
